White sandy beach attracting visitors with restaurants & resort hotels.
Tarkwa Bay is an artificial sheltered beach located near the Lagos harbour in Nigeria.
Kuramo Beach is a sandy beach in Lagos, Nigeria, located at the south side of Victoria Island.
Oniru Beach is a beautiful private beach, a popular venue for parties, live shows and special events.
Atican Beach Resort in Lagos, Nigeria. Best Beach Resort and Beach Hotel in Lagos, Nigeria.

LUFASI is an urban forest dedicated for people to connect and interact with nature.
Gberefu Island also known as Point of No Return is a populated historical island located in Badagry.
Freedom Park is a memorial and leisure park area in the middle of downtown Lagos in Lagos Island.
Leisure Sports Park (LSP) is the number one destination for team-led sports in Lekki. Located conveniently in the suburbs of Lekki.
